forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some early morning breaks in the overcast, otherwise cloudy. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers late. Low 52F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
